rewrite1:
Please make the following adjustments to the document:

In the third paragraph, set the spacing before the paragraph to one line and remove any bold formatting from the text.

In the fifth paragraph, assign Outline Level 6 to the text. Adjust the font size to 8 points and choose a wave-style underline. Then, modify the indentation on the right side to 1 cm.

For the ninth paragraph, bolden the entire text and apply a 1 cm hanging indent. Change the font color to blue and add a dotted underline for emphasis.
rewrite2:
Please proceed with the following formatting changes to the document:

In the third paragraph, please set the spacing before the paragraph to one line and remove any bold formatting from the text.

Moving on to the fifth paragraph, assign it an Outline Level 6, adjust the font size to 8 points, and apply a wave-style underline. Additionally, alter the indentation on the right to 1 cm.

Lastly, for the ninth paragraph, make the text bold, implement a 1 cm hanging indent, change the font color to blue, and add a dotted underline for emphasis.
rewrite3:
To reformat the third paragraph, set the space before it to the equivalent of one line and remove any bold formatting from the text.

When working on the fifth paragraph, assign it an Outline Level 6, reduce the font size to 8 points, and choose the wave underline option. Also, adjust the right indentation to 1 centimeter.

For the ninth paragraph, embolden the text, apply a 1-centimeter hanging indent, turn the font color to blue, and select a dotted underline style.
